metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20367 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
nlist.c in libbsd before 0.10.0 has an out-of-bounds read during a comparison for a symbol name from the string table (strtab).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libbsd0 - 0.8.7-1ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libbsd package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.7-1ubuntu0.1').
